timeline.bodyText: Please add symbol ⤶ to the end of the each line (\u2936) to make it clear.
timeline.author: pbludov

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/NewlineAtEndOfFileCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/NewlineAtEndOfFileCheck.java index 92f97ad62..413ebd47d 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/NewlineAtEndOfFileCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/NewlineAtEndOfFileCheck.java @@ -91,15 +91,15 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.FileText; *

Example:

* 
  * // File ending with a new line
- * public class Test {
- *
- * }
- * // ok
+ * public class Test {⤶
+ * ⤶
+ * }⤶
+ * ⤶// ok
  *
  * // File ending without a new line
- * public class Test1 {
- *
- * } // violation, the file does not end with a new line
+ * public class Test1 {⤶
+ * ⤶
+ * }⤶ // violation, the file does not end with a new line
  *
*

* To configure the check to always use Unix-style line separators:

timeline.bodyText:
Please add another case
 * public class Test1 {⤶
 *⤶
 * }⤶
// violation, the file ends with a new line, but not in the requested format

timeline.bodyText: Same here. There should be no ⤶ symbol on the last line. It is assumed that the file ends immediately after the }' character.
timeline.author: pbludov

timeline.bodyText:
This file ends with two ⤶ symbols. It should be simple
 }⤶// ok

For clarity, please add a note like
The // ok comment is "virtual", not actually present in the file.

timeline.bodyText: The violation message for this case is Expected line ending for file is LF(\\n), but CRLF(\\r\\n) is detected, please change description to reflect that here line separator is different, no LF
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:

+ * Note: The comment // ok is a virtual, not actually present in the file
+ *
+ * // File ending without a new line

+ * }␍⤶ // violation, the file must end with LF only
